Please remove apache jars from your JRE lib/ext directory, or specify clean 
Java VM to Eclipse by passing it in -vm option.  Does it help?

Appears to have been caused by servlet 2.3 jar in the lib/ext directory.  
Removed jar and help now operates correctly.  Sorry for the false alarm.

Tom
